section.title: SolutionStudio Files and Folders
section.para: SolutionStudio has several key files and folders, listed in the table below.

row.entry: SolutionStudio looks for this file to locate solutionstudio configuration. See the solutionstudio and solutionstudio.conf man pages for more information. This file is optional and does not exist in the default SolutionStudio installation.
Python code for SolutionStudio, where $version is the Python version.
Documentation for SolutionStudio, where $version is the SolutionStudio version.
Relax NG schemas for solution definition validation.
SolutionStudio stores cached content in this folder. See the solutionstudio and solutionstudio.conf man pages for cache-related options.
SolutionStudio publishes completed solutions to this folder by default. An alternative location can be specified on a per solution basis within a solution definition.
